bit.name: Try To Stay Still When Crouched
Crouch When In Line Of Fire

float32.name: Maximum Vision Distance
float32.tooltip: maximum range of sight

degree.name: Central Vision Angle
degree.tooltip: horizontal angle within which we see targets out to our maximum range

degree.name: Maximum Vision Angle
degree.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we see targets at range

degree.name: Peripheral Vision Angle
degree.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we can see targets out of the corner of our eye

float32.name: Peripheral Distance
float32.tooltip: maximum range at which we can see targets our of the corner of our eye

vector3.name: Standing Gun Offset
vector3.tooltip: offset of gun from feet when standing (x=forward, y=left, z=up)

vector3.name: Crouching Gun Offset
vector3.tooltip: offset of gun from feet when crouch (x=forward, y=left, z=up)

float32.name: Hearing Distance
float32.tooltip: maximum range at which sounds can be heard

float32.name: Notice Projectile Chance
float32.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous enemy projectile (e.g. grenade)

float32.name: Notice Vehicle Chance
float32.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous vehicle

float32.name: Combat Perception Time
float32.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are already in combat or searching for them

float32.name: Guard Perception Time
float32.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we have been alerted

float32.name: Non-Combat Perception Time
float32.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are not alerted

float32.name: Dive Into Cover Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of running a dive animation when moving into cover

float32.name: Emerge From Cover Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of running an emerge animation when uncovering a target

float32.name: Dive From Grenade Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of running a dive animation when moving away from a grenade

float32.name: Glass Ignorance Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of not noticing that breakable surfaces have been destroyed

float32.name: Stationary Movement Distance
float32.tooltip: movement distance which is considered 'stationary' for considering whether we crouch

float32.name: Free-Flying Sidestep
float32.tooltip: distance which we allow sidestepping for flying units

degree.name: Begin Moving Angle
degree.tooltip: we must be facing this close to our target before we start applying the throttle (default

degree2.name: Maximum Aiming Deviation
degree2.tooltip: how far we can turn our weapon

degree2.name: Maximum Looking Deviation
degree2.tooltip: how far we can turn our head

degree.name: Noncombat Look Delta Left
degree.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when not in combat

degree.name: Noncombat Look Delta Right
degree.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when not in combat

degree.name: Combat Look Delta Left
degree.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when in combat

degree.name: Combat Look Delta Right
degree.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when in combat

degree2.name: Idle Aiming Range
degree2.tooltip: range in which we select random directions to aim in

degree2.name: Idle Looking Range
degree2.tooltip: range in which we select random directions to look at

rangef.name: Event Look Time Modifier
rangef.tooltip: multiplier for how long we look at interesting events (zero = unchanged)

rangef.name: Noncombat Idle Facing
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when not in combat

rangef.name: Noncombat Idle Aiming
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when not in combat

rangef.name: Noncombat Idle Looking
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when not in combat

rangef.name: Guard Idle Facing
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when guarding

rangef.name: Guard Idle Aiming
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when guarding

rangef.name: Guard Idle Looking
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when guarding

rangef.name: Combat Idle Facing
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when searching or in combat

rangef.name: Combat Idle Aiming
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when searching or in combat

rangef.name: Combat Idle Looking
rangef.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when searching or in combat

enum16.name: Unreachable Danger Trigger
enum16.tooltip: danger level of an unreachable enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

enum16.name: Vehicle Danger Trigger
enum16.tooltip: danger level of a vehicle-based enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

enum16.name: Player Danger Trigger
enum16.tooltip: danger level of an enemy player which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

rangef.name: Danger Trigger Time
rangef.tooltip: how long it takes for an unopposable enemy that has the above danger level to trigger a retreat

int16.name: Friends Killed Trigger
int16.tooltip: if this many of our friends are killed by an unopposable enemy, we trigger a retreat (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

int16.name: Friends Retreating Trigger
int16.tooltip: if this many of our friends are retreating from an unopposable enemy, we retreat as well (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

rangef.name: Retreat Time
rangef.tooltip: how long we retreat from an unopposable enemy for

rangef.name: Cowering Time
rangef.tooltip: how long we hide in cover after being panicked

float32.name: Friend Killed Panic Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of panicking when we see a friend killed near us and the enemy is looking at us too

enum16.name: Leader Type
enum16.tooltip: if we see a friend of this type killed we have a chance of panicking

float32.name: Leader Killed Panic Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of panicking when we see a leader killed

float32.name: Panic Damage Threshold
float32.tooltip: panic if we take this much body damage in a short period of time

float32.name: Surprise Distance
float32.tooltip: the distance at which newly acknowledged props or weapon impacts are considered 'close' for surprise purposes

plugin.comment: danger values: being aimed at: 0.7 an enemy shooting in our general direction: 1.2 an enemy shooting directly at us: 1.6 an enemy damaging us: 2.0

rangef.name: Hide Behind Cover Time
rangef.tooltip: how long we stay behind cover after seeking cover

float32.name: Hide Target-Not-Visible Time
float32.tooltip: if this is non-zero then we will only seek cover if our target has not been visible recently

float32.name: Hide Shield Fraction
float32.tooltip: elites and jackals only seek cover if their shield falls below this value

float32.name: Attack Shield Fraction
float32.tooltip: elites and jackals only come out from cover to attack if they have this much shields

float32.name: Pursue Shield Fraction
float32.tooltip: elites and jackals only come out from cover to pursue if they have this much shields

float32.name: Attacking Crouch Threshold
float32.tooltip: when in attacking mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

float32.name: Defending Crouch Threshold
float32.tooltip: when in defending mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

float32.name: Minimum Stand Time
float32.tooltip: minimum time to remain standing (zero = default)

float32.name: Minimum Crouch Time
float32.tooltip: minimum time to remain crouching (zero = default)

float32.name: Defending Hide Time Modifier
float32.tooltip: how much longer we hide behind cover for when in the defending state (zero = unchanged)

float32.name: Attacking Evasion Threshold
float32.tooltip: when in attacking mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

float32.name: Defending Evasion Threshold
float32.tooltip: when in defending mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

float32.name: Evasion Seek-Cover Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of seeking cover (otherwise we just evade)

float32.name: Evasion Delay Time
float32.tooltip: minimum time period between evasion moves

float32.name: Maximum Seek-Cover Distance
float32.tooltip: maximum distance we will consider going to find cover (zero = default)

float32.name: Cover Damage Threshold
float32.tooltip: how much damage we must take before we are allowed to seek cover (zero = always allowed to)

float32.name: Stalking Discovery Time
float32.tooltip: if our target sees us for this long while we are stalking them, our cover is blown and we do something else (zero = never stop stalking)

float32.name: Stalking Maximum Distance
float32.tooltip: distance outside of which we don't bother stalking

degree.name: Stationary Facing Angle
degree.tooltip: angle outside of which we must abandon a stationary facing direction and suffer any penalties

float32.name: Change-Facing Stand Time
float32.tooltip: how long we must stand up for after changing our fixed stationary facing

rangef.name: Uncover Delay Time
rangef.tooltip: time to look at target's position after it becomes visible

rangef.name: Target Search Time
rangef.tooltip: time we search at target's position

rangef.name: Pursuit-Position Time
rangef.tooltip: time we search at a pursuit position

int16.name: Number Of Positions (Coord)
int16.tooltip: number of pursuit positions to check when in coordinated group search mode

int16.name: Number Of Positions (Normal)
int16.tooltip: number of pursuit positions to check when in normal search mode

float32.name: Melee Attack Delay
float32.tooltip: how long we must wait between attempting melee attacks

float32.name: Melee Fudge Factor
float32.tooltip: fudge factor that offsets how far in front of the target we start our attack (negative = we try to time our attack so that we go _through_ the target). this should be close to zero, but might be bigger for suiciding units

float32.name: Melee Charge Time
float32.tooltip: how long we can stay in the charging state trying to reach our target before we give up

rangef.name: Melee Leap Range
rangef.tooltip: we can launch leaping melee attacks at targets within these ranges (zero = can't leap)

float32.name: Melee Leap Velocity
float32.tooltip: how fast we spring at targets when launching a leaping melee attack

float32.name: Melee Leap Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of launching a leaping melee attack at a ground-based target (we always leap at flying targets)

float32.name: Melee Leap Ballistic
float32.tooltip: fraction that controls how ballistic our leaping melee trajectory is

float32.name: Berserk Damage Amount
float32.tooltip: amount of body damage in a short time that makes us berserk

float32.name: Berserk Damage Threshold
float32.tooltip: how low our body health must get before we will consider berserking

float32.name: Berserk Proximity
float32.tooltip: if we ever get this close to a target, we berserk

float32.name: Suicide Sensing Distance
float32.tooltip: when we are this close to a target, we check to see if they're getting away and if so blow up

float32.name: Berserk Grenade Chance
float32.tooltip: chance of berserking when we have a dangerous projectile stuck to us

rangef.name: Guard Position Time
rangef.tooltip: time after which we decide to change guard positions (zero = never)

rangef.name: Combat Position Time
rangef.tooltip: time after which we change combat firing positions

float32.name: Old Position Avoid Distance
float32.tooltip: distance we try and stay from our last discarded firing position

float32.name: Friend Avoid Distance
float32.tooltip: distance we try and stay from any friends

rangef.name: Noncombat Idle Speech Time
rangef.tooltip: time between idle vocalizations when we are not in combat

rangef.name: Combat Idle Speech Time
rangef.tooltip: time between idle vocalizations when we are in combat or searching
